attributes.action: Introduce mandatory staff training on Anti-Bullying during INSET days
attributes.background: Too many schools have a bullying problem and sometimes they do not acknowledge they have a problem with bullying. I believe that Staff training on INSET days for topics like Anti-Bullying should come compulsory to enable staff to have the knowledge to be proactive about bullying.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because its about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

This would be a decision for individual schools.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to fund a national anti-bullying campaign if that's something you would like to see happen.
